content: come join our crochet along and create a stunning moonrise mountain tapestry wall hanging please create a ravelry project and join our facebook community to share wip photos and have fun join --> **here ** 1 more details and the pattern as released can be found on my blog post here --> https //www greenfoxfarmsdesigns com/moonrise-mountain-learn-tapestry-crochet-along-cal-free-pattern **crochet along details ** ✦ cal april 22 - may 26 pattern launches may 6 2024 ✦ mmt written pattern is free on the blog tapestry chart left and right handed directions and bonus are included with the premium pattern upgrade ✦ weekly lives in my fb group on mondays during the cal **supplies needed ** ✦ high desert yarn hand dyed crochet along yarn kit order the hand dyed yarn kit --> **here ** 2 ✦ or bulky/chunky weight yarn any fiber ✦ yardage 230 - 270 yards ✦ hook h/8 5 0 mm hook ✦ 3/8 x 14 dowel or stick for hanging **schedule ** ✦ week 1 row 1 - 24 - may 6 - 12 ✦ week 2 row 25 - 48 - may 13 - 19 ✦ week 3 row 49 - 55 hanger + fringe - may 20 - 26 ✦ live in my fb group to answer questions and kick off the event watch the week 1 replay --> ** here 3 ** ***moonrise mountain tapestry wall hanging*** ✦ create a beautiful wall hanging for your home ✦ celestial wall hanging adds a finishing touch to your home decor ✦ create a celestial tapestry in your favorite colors ✦ works up quickly with bulky yarn ✦ wall hanging measures about 11 wide x 15 long not counting the hanger or fringe --> learn tapestry crochet with included tutorials --> this is an intermediate crochet pattern with frequent color changes but simple stitches ✦ what is included ✦ 8 page pdf pattern in us english with american crochet terms your pattern is available to download from your ravelry purchases and an email will be sent with a download link as well ✦ size ✦ 11 wide x 15 long approximately tapestry only ✦ materials needed ✦ high desert yarn north rim bulky yarn or chunky/bulky 5 yarn of choice 230-270 yards total h/8 5 0 mm hook yarn needle scissors 14 dowel rod or branch for hanging ✦ pattern key ✦ slip_stitch - slip_stitch chain s - chain s single_crochet - single_crochet ✦ ✦ ***green fox farms designs original crochet pattern *** ✦ ✦ due to the nature of digital downloads there are no refunds for this item i am here to help if you have any questions my email and social media contacts are included with each pattern purchase as well as photo tutorials for challenging or unusual stitches you may sell items you make using this pattern if you sell them online please provide a link back to my shop this pattern is for use by the purchaser only and cannot be sold copied or used
